bug.author: RegisWu
bug.description:
Hi, I follow the instructions to install latest version of face_alignment and run it to detect facial landmarks. But it reports errors as following, could you please give me some advice to solve this problem? Thanks! My environment is python3.8 + pytorch16 + cuda10.2 (install with pip install face-alignment)
import face_alignment from skimage import io fa = face_alignment.FaceAlignment(face_alignment.LandmarksType._2D, flip_input=False) input = io.imread('/home/reg/Project/DECA/TestSamples/examples/IMG_0392_inputs.jpg') preds = fa.get_landmarks(input) Traceback (most recent call last): File "", line 1, in File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/face_alignment/api.py", line 101, in get_landmarks return self.get_landmarks_from_image(image_or_path, detected_faces) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/torch/autograd/grad_mode.py", line 15, in decorate_context return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/face_alignment/api.py", line 120, in get_landmarks_from_image detected_faces = self.face_detector.detect_from_image(image.copy()) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/face_alignment/detection/sfd/sfd_detector.py", line 44, in detect_from_image bboxlist = detect(self.face_detector, image, device=self.device)[0] File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/face_alignment/detection/sfd/detect.py", line 19, in detect return batch_detect(net, img, device) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/face_alignment/detection/sfd/detect.py", line 45, in batch_detect bboxlists = get_predictions(List(olist), batch_size) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/dispatcher.py", line 433, in _compile_for_args raise e File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/dispatcher.py", line 366, in _compile_for_args return self.compile(tuple(argtypes)) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler_lock.py", line 32, in _acquire_compile_lock return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/dispatcher.py", line 857, in compile cres = self._compiler.compile(args, return_type) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/dispatcher.py", line 77, in compile status, retval = self._compile_cached(args, return_type) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/dispatcher.py", line 91, in _compile_cached retval = self._compile_core(args, return_type) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/dispatcher.py", line 104, in _compile_core cres = compiler.compile_extra(self.targetdescr.typing_context, File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler.py", line 602, in compile_extra return pipeline.compile_extra(func) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler.py", line 352, in compile_extra return self._compile_bytecode() File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler.py", line 414, in _compile_bytecode return self._compile_core() File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler.py", line 394, in _compile_core raise e File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler.py", line 385, in _compile_core pm.run(self.state) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler_machinery.py", line 339, in run raise patched_exception File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler_machinery.py", line 330, in run self._runPass(idx, pass_inst, state) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler_lock.py", line 32, in _acquire_compile_lock return func(*args, **kwargs) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler_machinery.py", line 289, in _runPass mutated |= check(pss.run_pass, internal_state) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/compiler_machinery.py", line 262, in check mangled = func(compiler_state) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/typed_passes.py", line 449, in run_pass NativeLowering().run_pass(state) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/typed_passes.py", line 375, in run_pass lower.create_cpython_wrapper(flags.release_gil) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/lowering.py", line 242, in create_cpython_wrapper self.context.create_cpython_wrapper(self.library, self.fndesc, File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/cpu.py", line 162, in create_cpython_wrapper builder.build() File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/callwrapper.py", line 122, in build self.build_wrapper(api, builder, closure, args, kws) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/callwrapper.py", line 187, in build_wrapper obj = api.from_native_return(retty, retval, env_manager) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/pythonapi.py", line 1389, in from_native_return out = self.from_native_value(typ, val, env_manager) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/pythonapi.py", line 1403, in from_native_value return impl(typ, val, c) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/core/boxing.py", line 397, in box_array np_dtype = numpy_support.as_dtype(typ.dtype) File "/home/reg/anaconda3/envs/pytorch16/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numba/np/numpy_support.py", line 151, in as_dtype raise NotImplementedError("%r cannot be represented as a Numpy dtype" NotImplementedError: Failed in nopython mode pipeline (step: nopython mode backend) list(list(float64)<iv=None>)<iv=None> cannot be represented as a Numpy dtype

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RegisWu>@RegisWu</denchmark-link> could you try from source please?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/1adrianb>@1adrianb</denchmark-link> I tried to reinstall from source and the problem is solved now. Many thanks!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/1adrianb>@1adrianb</denchmark-link> I got the same error today, on python 3.8.5 pytorch-cpu 1.7.1 numba 0.51.2. (I installed face_alignment using conda)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/chenmingjiongjiong>@chenmingjiongjiong</denchmark-link> are you sure that you are using the latest version? Try printing (The latest version is 1.3.3) The above error is triggered in the SFD detector, which shouldn't be possible since that code path was removed.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/1adrianb>@1adrianb</denchmark-link> I'm using 1.3.2. But I see the latest release on github is 1.3.2?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/chenmingjiongjiong>@chenmingjiongjiong</denchmark-link> Please upgrade to 1.3.3 or install from source
